subtitle: Position of current price within today’s high-low range.

measures.caveats: Can bounce around mid in chop.
measures.what_it_measures: Day Range Pos derived from market data.

assistant_hints: Avoid early minutes; range not established yet.
Use with volume/volatility context to avoid chop traps.
High values near 1.0 often imply momentum continuation risk for fades.
Combine with VWAP/EMA for better timing.
beginner_summary: Position of current price within today’s high-low range.
